title: 求！1.8怎么用命令方块拿打火石？
author: 真是灰了~

replies.author: pigserafing
replies.txt_content:
http://minecraft-ids.grahamedgecombe.com/
1.8的 命令方块 都是需要输入名字的
/give @p minecraft:flint_and_steel 1
